name: electricity, high voltage, hydro, import from CA-ON | electricity, high voltage | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15605/documentation

This dataset represents the amount of imported electricity from Ontario (Canada) to Quebec (Canada). The electricity comes exclusively from hydropower plants.The import value is valid for 2014 and includes all electricity imports, independently whether used within the importing country, or re-exported. For a discussion of different ways of modeling electricity trade in LCI, please refer to (Itten & Frischknecht 2014).

This activity represents the point of 'handing over' the electricity from one country to the other at the border.

This dataset doesn't include any electricity losses or transmission infrastructure as these are accounted for in the market datasets.
